title: On using Git [TUTORIAL(ish)]
preview:
Well, this is obviously a Github page so I kinda have to know how to use Git, I'll give you that but this is more like a kinda tutorial for people that might not be familiar with it, so if you've been trying to learn how to use Git or you're just curious as hell then keep reading this.

Since I've been using it, at first out of curiosity and later on to manage my thesis project implementation and managing the project I was collaborating on my previous job, I've found it incredibly usefull for software development and I really wish that I knew it earlier on my "career".
